item.name: Live Courses API

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Advanced Web Development with React & Node.js",
  "description": "A comprehensive live course on building modern web applications with React and Node.js. Learn from industry experts through interactive sessions.",
  "shortDescription": "Master full-stack development with React and Node.js",
  "levelId": "{{course_level_id}}",
  "categoryId": "{{course_category_id}}",
  "teacherIds": ["{{teacher_user_id}}"],
  "durationDays": 60,
  "isPaid": true,
  "price": 1499.99,
  "discountEnabled": true,
  "thumbnailUrl": "https://example.com/thumbnails/react-nodejs.jpg",
  "coverImage": "https://example.com/covers/react-nodejs-banner.jpg",
  "introVideoUrl": "https://youtube.com/watch?v=abc123",
  "demoUrl": "https://demo.example.com/react-nodejs",
  "screenshots": [
    "https://example.com/screenshots/react-nodejs-1.jpg",
    "https://example.com/screenshots/react-nodejs-2.jpg"
  ],
  "techStack": ["React", "Node.js", "Express", "MongoDB"],
  "programmingLanguages": ["JavaScript", "TypeScript"],
  "features": "Weekly live sessions with experts\nInteractive Q&A sessions\nReal-world project development\nPersonalized code reviews",
  "prerequisites": "Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript\nFamiliarity with web development concepts",
  "whatYouGet": "Access to all live sessions\nCourse materials and resources\nCertificate of completion\nLifetime access to recordings",
  "hasCertificate": true,
  "certificateTemplateUrl": "https://example.com/certificates/template.pdf",
  "supportIncluded": true,
  "supportDuration": 90,
  "supportEmail": "support@example.com",
  "whatYouLearn": [
    "Build full-stack applications with React and Node.js",
    "Implement authentication and authorization",
    "Create RESTful APIs and integrate with frontend",
    "Deploy applications to production environments"
  ],
  "requirements": [
    "Computer with minimum 8GB RAM",
    "Modern web browser",
    "Stable internet connection for live sessions"
  ]
}

item.name: Course Level Management API

request.description: Upload multiple course levels in a single operation. Supports prerequisite validation and conflict resolution options.
Get detailed information about a specific course level. Public endpoint that doesn't require authentication.
Retrieve all course levels with optional statistics. Returns levels in hierarchical order with prerequisite relationships.

item.description:
API collection for managing course levels including bulk upload operations, level retrieval, and level-specific data management.

**Features:**
- Bulk upload course levels
- Retrieve all course levels
- Get specific course level details
- Level-based course organization

**Base URL:** `/api/course-levels`

**Authentication:** Teacher role required for management operations, public access for viewing individual levels

item.name: File Upload API

request.description:
Upload multiple files with metadata and access control options. Supports various file types including documents, images, videos, and course materials.

**Supported File Types:**
- Documents: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, RTF
- Images: JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, SVG, WEBP
- Videos: MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, FLV
- Archives: ZIP, RAR, 7Z
- Presentations: PPT, PPTX
- Spreadsheets: XLS, XLSX
- Audio: MP3, WAV, AAC

**Security Features:**
- File type validation
- Size limits enforcement
- Virus scanning
- Access control by roles
- Secure storage with encryption

**Upload Categories:**
- course_material: Course-related files
- project_file: Project assets and deliverables
- profile_image: User profile pictures
- document: General documents
- assignment: Student assignments
- resource: Learning resources
- certificate: Certificates and achievements

item.description:
API collection for handling file uploads with support for multiple file types, secure storage, and authenticated access.

**Features:**
- Multi-file upload support
- Authenticated file uploads
- Dynamic file handling
- Secure file storage
- File type validation

**Base URL:** `/api/file-upload`

**Authentication:** Bearer token required for all file upload operations

item.name: User Onboarding API

request.description: First step of onboarding: User selects their preferred languages. Creates associations between user and selected languages. Validates that all language IDs exist before proceeding.
Second step of onboarding: User selects their learning goal. Updates user's goal and returns all skills related to the selected goal for the next step.
Final step of onboarding: User selects specific skills and completes onboarding. Validates that selected skills belong to the chosen goal, creates skill associations, and marks user as onboarded.
Final step of onboarding: User selects specific skills and completes onboarding. Validates that selected skills belong to the chosen goal, creates skill associations, and marks user as onboarded.

item.description:
**COMPREHENSIVE USER ONBOARDING** - Complete user onboarding flow for new users including language selection, goal selection, and skills selection.

**Onboarding Flow:**
1. Language Selection - Users select preferred languages
2. Goal Selection - Users choose their learning goal (returns related skills)
3. Skills Selection - Users select specific skills and complete onboarding

**Key Features:**
- Multi-language preference selection
- Goal-based skill recommendation
- Skill validation against selected goal
- Automatic onboarding completion marking
- Progress tracking through onboarding steps

**Base URL:** `/api/onboarding`

**Authentication:** Required - User must be logged in

**Process:** Sequential - Each step builds on the previous

item.name: OTP Management API Collection

request.description: Verify OTP after user registration. Supports both email and mobile identifiers. Returns user data and authentication token upon successful verification.
Resend OTP during registration process via email. Includes rate limiting (60 second cooldown).
Send OTP for password reset to user's email. Validates user exists before sending.
Verify OTP for password reset. Marks user as eligible for password reset upon successful verification.
Reset password using verified OTP. Requires OTP verification to be completed first.

item.description: Comprehensive OTP management API endpoints with advanced features including SMS/Email delivery, rate limiting, and password reset flows

item.name: User Routes API Collection

request.description: Register a new user. Email or mobile is required. Password is required for non-student roles. Role options: student, teacher, admin
Login user. Identifier can be email or mobile. For students, OTP is sent. For other roles, password authentication is used.
Login for student role - sends OTP to identifier (email/mobile)
Get user details by ID including languages, goals, and skills
Get homepage data including banners, courses, categories, and user's enrolled courses

item.description: Comprehensive API endpoints for user authentication and student management with all available fields
